body_html: @teng-li I can confirm that when I use nccl, then test_conv_weight_grad_between_local_and_distributed and test_conv_weight_between_distributeds failed when I use c10d, all tests passed when I use deprecated. When I use gloo, then regardless of either using the old distributed or new c10d library, test_conv_weight_grad_between_local_and_distributed and test_conv_weight_between_distributeds failed.
body_text: @teng-li I can confirm that when I use nccl, then test_conv_weight_grad_between_local_and_distributed and test_conv_weight_between_distributeds failed when I use c10d, all tests passed when I use deprecated. When I use gloo, then regardless of either using the old distributed or new c10d library, test_conv_weight_grad_between_local_and_distributed and test_conv_weight_between_distributeds failed.
body: @teng-li I can confirm that when I use nccl, then `test_conv_weight_grad_between_local_and_distributed` and `test_conv_weight_between_distributeds` failed when I use c10d, all tests passed when I use deprecated. When I use gloo, then regardless of either using the old distributed or new c10d library, `test_conv_weight_grad_between_local_and_distributed` and `test_conv_weight_between_distributeds` failed.
